description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代的诸侯国，战国七雄之一，姬姓韩氏。由三家分晋而来，最终被秦国所灭。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period in China, one of the Seven Warring States. It was of the Ji family name and Han clan. It originated from the Partition of Jin and was eventually conquered by the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的诸侯国，战国七雄之一，最终统一六国。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty in China, one of the Seven Warring States, which eventually unified the other six states.

description.zh-cn: 春秋末年，晋国被韩、赵、魏三家瓜分的事件。此事件被视为战国时期开始的标志。
description.en: An event in the late Spring and Autumn period where the State of Jin was divided among the three families of Han, Zhao, and Wei. This event is considered the beginning of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 东周君主。他在位期间，正式承认韩、赵、魏三家为诸侯。
description.en: A monarch of the Eastern Zhou Dynasty. During his reign, he officially recognized the three families of Han, Zhao, and Wei as feudal lords.

description.zh-cn: 韩国开国君主。
description.en: The founding monarch of the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 秦国对韩国发动的统一战争，此战结束后韩国灭亡。
description.en: The unification war launched by the State of Qin against the State of Han, which led to the demise of Han.

description.zh-cn: 韩国末代君主。
description.en: The last monarch of the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的诸侯国，位于中原，后被韩国所灭。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty in China, located in the Central Plain, later conquered by the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 韩国君主，在位期间任用申不害变法，使韩国国力达到顶峰。
description.en: A monarch of the State of Han. During his reign, he appointed Shen Buhai to carry out reforms, bringing Han's power to its zenith.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期法家代表人物，韩国宰相。他主张君主应以“术”来驾驭臣下。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school during the Warring States period and Chancellor of the State of Han. He advocated that a ruler should use 'shu' (administrative methods/arts) to control his ministers.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国与赵国之间的一场决定性战役，因韩国上党郡投降赵国而引发。
description.en: A decisive battle between the states of Qin and Zhao during the Warring States period, triggered by the surrender of Han's Shangdang Commandery to Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period in China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 战国末年韩国水利工程师，奉韩王之命赴秦国修建郑国渠。
description.en: A hydraulic engineer from the State of Han in the late Warring States period, sent to the State of Qin by the King of Han to build the Zheng Guo Canal.

description.zh-cn: 韩国宗室贵族，战国末期法家思想的集大成者。
description.en: A nobleman of the royal family of the State of Han, and the great synthesizer of Legalist thought in the late Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期儒家学者，曾为韩非与李斯的老师。
description.en: A Confucian scholar in the late Warring States period, who was the teacher of Han Fei and Li Si.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，法家代表人物，韩非的同学。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin Dynasty, a representative figure of Legalism, and a fellow student of Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 秦国君主，后成为中国首位皇帝。
description.en: The monarch of the State of Qin who later became the first emperor of China.

description.zh-cn: 韩国相国，与严遂争权，后被聂政刺杀。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Han, who vied for power with Yan Sui and was later assassinated by Nie Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 韩国君主。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 韩国大臣，与韩相侠累有私仇，后雇佣聂政将其刺杀。
description.en: A minister of the State of Han who had a personal feud with Chancellor Xia Lei and later hired Nie Zheng to assassinate him.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期著名刺客，受严遂所托刺杀了韩相侠累。
description.en: A famous assassin of the Warring States period, who assassinated Chancellor Xia Lei of Han at the behest of Yan Sui.

description.zh-cn: 韩国宰相，历相韩昭侯、韩宣惠王与韩襄王三代，为张良的祖父。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Han, serving three generations of monarchs: Marquis Zhao, King Xuanhui, and King Xiang. He was the grandfather of Zhang Liang.

description.zh-cn: 韩国宰相，历相韩釐王与韩桓惠王两代，为张开地之子、张良之父。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Han, serving two generations of monarchs: King Xi and King Huanhui. He was the son of Zhang Kaidi and the father of Zhang Liang.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣，出身于韩国贵族，其祖父与父亲曾五代相韩。
description.en: A founding father of the Han Dynasty, who came from the nobility of the State of Han. His grandfather and father served as chancellors to five generations of Han rulers.

description.zh-cn: 齐国为救援被魏国攻打的韩国，采用“围魏救赵”的策略（此处为救韩），在马陵大败魏军的战役。
description.en: A battle where the State of Qi, to rescue the besieged State of Han from the State of Wei, employed the strategy of 'besieging Wei to rescue Zhao' (in this case, Han) and decisively defeated the Wei army at Maling.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period in China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty in China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋事件后，周天子正式承认韩、赵、魏为诸侯国，韩国由此建立。
description.en: After the Partition of Jin, the King of Zhou formally recognized Han, Zhao, and Wei as vassal states, leading to the establishment of the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王册封晋国大夫韩虔为诸侯，使韩国正式成为诸侯国。
description.en: King Weilie of Zhou enfeoffed Han Qian, a grand master of Jin, as a feudal lord, officially making Han a vassal state.

description.zh-cn: 韩景侯韩虔是韩国的始封之君，被周威烈王册封为诸侯。
description.en: Marquis Jing of Han, Han Qian, was the founding monarch of the State of Han, enfeoffed by King Weilie of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 秦国发动灭韩之战，俘虏韩王安，韩国灭亡，成为六国中第一个被秦所灭的诸侯国。
description.en: The State of Qin launched the war to conquer Han, captured King An, and the State of Han was destroyed, becoming the first of the six states to be eliminated by Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦国在灭韩之战中俘虏了韩王安。
description.en: The State of Qin captured King An of Han during its conquest of Han.

description.zh-cn: 韩国灭亡郑国，并迁都至其故都新郑。
description.en: The State of Han conquered the State of Zheng and moved its capital to Zheng's former capital, Xinzheng.

description.zh-cn: 韩昭侯任用申不害为相，推行法家“术”治，使韩国国力达到鼎盛。
description.en: Marquis Zhao of Han appointed Shen Buhai as Chancellor, who implemented the Legalist concept of 'shu' (administrative methods), bringing the State of Han to the peak of its power.

description.zh-cn: 担任宰相期间，内修政教，外应诸侯，使韩国国治兵强，十五年间无他国侵犯。
description.en: During his tenure as Chancellor, he reformed the administration and managed foreign relations, making the state well-governed and its military strong, preventing invasions for fifteen years.

description.zh-cn: 秦国攻取韩国野王城，切断了上党郡与韩国本土的联系。上党郡守不愿降秦，转而将该郡献给赵国，从而引发了秦赵之间的长平之战。
description.en: The State of Qin captured Han's Yewang city, cutting off the Shangdang Commandery from the Han mainland. The commandery governor, unwilling to surrender to Qin, offered the territory to the State of Zhao, which triggered the Battle of Changping between Qin and Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 奉韩王之命入秦实施疲秦之计，但他修建的郑国渠极大地促进了秦国的农业发展，增加了其国力，加速了秦统一的进程。
description.en: Sent by the King of Han to Qin to implement a 'fatigue Qin' strategy, but the Zheng Guo Canal he built greatly boosted Qin's agricultural development, strengthened its national power, and accelerated its unification process.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾拜荀卿为师学习。
description.en: Han Fei once studied under Xun Kuang as his teacher.

description.zh-cn: 韩非出使秦国时，遭到同学李斯的妒忌和陷害，被迫在狱中自杀。
description.en: When Han Fei was on a diplomatic mission to the State of Qin, he was framed by his fellow student Li Si out of jealousy and was forced to commit suicide in prison.

description.zh-cn: 韩非出使秦国，后被迫侍奉秦始皇。
description.en: Han Fei went to the State of Qin as an envoy and was later forced to serve Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 侠累在韩烈侯在位初期担任韩国的相国。
description.en: Xia Lei served as the Chancellor of the State of Han during the early reign of Marquis Lie of Han.

description.zh-cn: 受严遂雇佣，刺杀了韩相侠累。
description.en: Hired by Yan Sui, Nie Zheng assassinated the Han Chancellor Xia Lei.

description.zh-cn: 严遂与韩相侠累争夺权力，失败后出走。
description.en: Yan Sui vied for power with Chancellor Xia Lei, and fled after his failure.

description.zh-cn: 张平是张开地之子。
description.en: Zhang Ping was the son of Zhang Kaidi.

description.zh-cn: 张良是张平之子。
description.en: Zhang Liang was the son of Zhang Ping.

description.zh-cn: 此战役是“围魏救韩”的结果，齐国为解救被魏国围攻的韩国而发动。
description.en: This battle was the result of 'besieging Wei to rescue Han', initiated by the State of Qi to save the State of Han, which was under attack by Wei.

description.zh-cn: 在马陵之战中，齐国出兵解救了被魏国攻打的韩国。
description.en: During the Battle of Maling, the State of Qi dispatched troops to rescue the State of Han, which was being attacked by the State of Wei.

description.zh-cn: 魏国在马陵之战前曾发兵攻打韩国。
description.en: The State of Wei had dispatched troops to attack the State of Han before the Battle of Maling.
